UserStory.heading: BGM
UserStory.Description: As a user, I want this game to have background music, So that I can enjoy music during play time.
UserStory.INVEST: I - Yes. It doesn't concern other features. N - Yes. Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation V - Yes. The user will benefit from the feature as they can have more fun to have a nice background music. E - Yes. We can estimate how long it will take, because it is not a big feature S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore fit into a sprint easily T - Yes. Tests were able to be created for it

Tests.Test: When the user starts the game, the background music is automatically turned on.
Add a music button. Given that user on the main screen when user press to the music button, system will turn on and off the background music.

UserStory.Label: Must Have
